text: Barry Ackroyd (born 12 May 1954) is an English Cinematographer. His notable films include United 93, The Hurt Locker and Capain Phillips. He won an Academy Award for Best Cinematography for The Hurt Locker. He has worked with the directors Ken Loach, Paul Greengrass and Kathryn Bigelow. The films that Ackroyd works in are usually very realistic and naturalistic. ==Films== Key Denotes films that have not yet been released Year Title Director Notes 1991 Riff-Raff Ken Loach 1993 Raining Stones Ken Loach 1994 Ladybird, Ladybird Ken Loach 1996 Carla's Song Ken Loach 1998 My Name Is Joe Ken Loach 2000 Bread and Roses Ken Loach 2001 The Navigators Ken Loach 2002 Sweet Sixteen Ken Loach 2004 Ae Fond Kiss...
